quoteText: If you want to keep your data and content, you will bear the responsibility to organize their transfer prior to the deletion of your account.
title: they provide a way to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data
tosdr.tldr: "You can ask us if we have any information related to you, and ask us information regarding their processing (for instance, the categories of data we process). This right allows you to ask Qwant to give you all this information."
